messages.subject: Interesting Anti-School website
messages.msgSnippet: Some of you may have seen this site before, but I just discovered it while looking at something completely unrelated to school or unschooling. Anyway, it is an
messages.messageBody:
Some of you may have seen this site before, but I just discovered it
while looking at something completely unrelated to school or
unschooling. Anyway, it is an anti-school site hosted by a teenaged
girl from South Africa. Lots of interesting opinions and stories
and how-to's, like how to effectively protest your school, and
such. Pretty impressive fight against the machine!

http://rise.f2o.org/schoolsurvival/

~Andrea, who will go back to lurking now.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
